name: Tractor Farm Driver - Gold
description:
Welcome to the Farm Driver Gold Edition with unique premium game balance and free of Ads.

Have you ever dreamt about to drive a tractor in a farm? Maybe in your childhood, or even a bit later, in your older ages? Some of ours feel the same !

The wait is over, now you have the chance to live your dreams and try to be the best Farm Driver in this Gold Edition game with premium game balance !!

Some users reported chrash issue. The game is tested on iPhone 4, 4S, iPad 2 and 3. iPad 1 and iPhone 3 and 3GS, ipod 4 is not supported!

There are 2 game modes:

PRACTICE

Free to play, without limitations. Drive your tractors with any cargoes you want. It's the best place to learn and feel how to drive your tractors. You can collect coins in this game mode.

DELIVERY

Your task is to deliver different cargoes in time to important stages like the piggery, the cowshed, the sawmill and the dairy.

This is a timed mode, the better time is always the winner.

Drive around the farm with different cargoes, on 30 missions and 5 different tractors.

Have fun on the farm !


Do you have comments, questions or suggestions?
Feel free to drop us a mail: info@catmoonproductions.com

facebook: facebook.com/CatmoonProductions

Don't forget to try out our other cool games :

Farm Driver: Skills Competition,
Tractor: more farm driving - country challenge,

Dust: Offroad Racing,
Nitrosprint 2!
